footer.CERTIFICATE: We are certified under the NOM ISO 9001:2015 to achieve adequate processes that fulfil the highest standards for our clients, including the assessment, design, production, distribution, tooling and even materials.

us.LAG: Lagalm Industrial is a company with a wide experience at the process of design and manufacture of plastic parts at plastic injection. We have a group of young and creative collaborators, committed with the total satisfaction of their clients and commercial partners. We offer integral solutions that make us flexible in a changing and more challenging and demanding market of high quality products.
us.SOLUTIONS: We have different available services for each stage of your project, from the design, measuring, manufacture to logistics, delivering your merchandise at your own company throughout a constant communication with our clients.

services.LAGSERVICES: As an added value offered by LAGALM Industrial,
services.SERVICES: within the maquila of plastic products, there is a machine shop and tools with numerical control technology to provide corrective or preventive maintenance to the production tooling.

why.WHY: We are a 100% Mexican company, with 16 years of active experience at the plastic injection and the mold making industry, through the years we have developed and implemented processes that allowed us to be an efficient and committed working team, that offers integral solutions to our clients, starting from the concept of your ideas till a final functional product and with quality standards above many of our competitors.

history.BORN: Was born in the year 2005 in Estado de México due to a development and expansion plan. Nevertheless, our founding partner had already more than a decade of experience when founding our company, this is why our experience in the market is even more extensive.

young.COMMITTED: We have a group of young collaborators, creative and committed to the total satisfaction of our customers and business partners.

mve.CONTENTS: LAGALM´S goal is to create high value products for our clients through an integration of design, manufacture, merchandising and distribution processes of plastic and metal products. We develop robust processes and procedures that allow us to offer specific solutions to each one of our clients.

LAGALM is: creative, efficient and disciplined, it has the objective of satisting and succeed our clients expectations, assuring for them high quality standards in products and services, positioning the company as one of the best at developing, manufacture, sales and distribution of plástic and metal products for the industry in general, allowing to enlarge our national and international market in the pursuit of new challenges.

At LAGALM we are committed to get the biggest satisfaction of our clients, providing the best product and efficiency in our services, observing and improving day after day our processes, accomplishing our compromises with the highest quality standards, being supported by our extensive experience in the market.

politic.QUALITY: As a manufacturer of plastic and metal parts we are committed to achieving the satisfaction of our customers, delivering products according to their requirements, the legal and applicable regulations, on the required date and with the established quality, through the continuous improvement of our Quality management system.

SERVICE-CARD.title: Design, development, repair, manufacturing and maintenance
SERVICE-CARD.sub: of tools for plastic injection, diecast and progressive dies
SERVICE-CARD.text: This is a special service for our clients who want the manufacture of their products.

SERVICE-CARD.title: Complementary additional services
SERVICE-CARD.text: Machining of metal parts in CNC Machining Center

SERVICE-CARD.title: Digitization service
SERVICE-CARD.text: This service allows our clients to analyze their products to achieve more efficient and precise processes, as we can propose improvements through the generation of diagrams, drawings, plans, models and prototypes.

SERVICE-CARD.title: Logistics
SERVICE-CARD.text: We have the ability to deliver our clients' production to their plant if required.

services.PROVIDE: Lagalm Industrial is here to provide you with more information, answer any questions you may have, and create an effective solution for your instructional needs.

you-need.OURTEAM: Interested in knowing more about our services? Our team take the time to answer your questions.
